original: Kā tvaṁ subhe devate vandase mamaṁ.
analyzed: kā tvam subhe devate vandase mama
dānam su ciṇṇam atha sīla saññama

original: Na chaḍḍitaṁ no pana khāditaṁ mayā,
analyzed: na chaḍḍitam no pana khāditam mayā
tuyham nu idam issariyam atha u mama
tat eva kammam kusalam katam mayā
tat eva kammam kusalam katam mayā
upa id ca vandim kusalañca pucchisa
